dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-contextlib2
dependencies.description:
contextlib2 is a backport of the standard library's contextlib module to
earlier Python versions.

dependent_to.name: py-netpyne
dependent_to.description:
Netpyne: A python package to facilitate the development, parallel
simulation, optimization and analysis of multiscale biological neuronal
networks in NEURON.
